content.name: com.microchip.mcu32.mplabx.project.usb_apps_device_hid_joystick_pic32mx470_curiosity
content.displayName: HID Joystick Example (hid_joystick) Example for PIC32MX Family
content.shortDescription: This demonstration application creates a custom HID joystick. This application is only intended to demonstrate creation of Joystick HID Report descriptors and may not be a definite end solution. The end application requirements may need the report descriptor to be modified.
content.author: Microchip
